Donation

Class DonationList

  • java.lang.Object
    • Donation.DonationList

  • public class DonationList
extends java.lang.Object
    MemberList class is the class that represents all the list of the members registered in TimeBanks website, mainly: The login method which throws two kinds of exceptions UserNotFoundExeption, and FailedLoginException:
    See Also:
    UserNotFoundExeption, FailedLoginException

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DonationList()
      a list of donation lists that exist in Timebanks

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDonation(Donation m)
      Method adddonation gives to the user the possibility to add a donation to the list that is already existing
      void deleteDonation(Donation m)
      deleteDonation enables the user to delete a donation from the existing list of donations
      void modifyDonation(Donation olddon, Donation mewdon)
      this behavior modify attributes of the corresponding donation class
      int searchDonation(Donation member)
      searchDonation searches for a specific donation between all the existing donations
      void sortMember(java.util.Comparator comp)
      Sort the donations corresponding to the specification of the user ( by name or balance)
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString method prints out all the existing donations
